name: Covid: Lockdown Edition
description:
Quick and Simple blast stuff and keep moving indefinitely.

The Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) has spread and the government is in a panic. You have been placed in to lockdown as a temporary security measure. You must fight off the infected cells as the virus starts to spread.

There three different types ranging from easier to kill and faster to harder to kill and slower, they are also represented by different sizes.

Movement - W , A , S ,D
Sprint  - Left Shift
Crouch  -  Left Ctrl
Shoot  - Mouse Button
Reload  -  R
Pause  -  P

NOTE: This is an endurance game where the object is to last as long as possible while scoring points.

Model assets from Cuboom

Made for the Brackeys 2021.2 Gamejam!
